titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on Zeta-cypermethrin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 12/17/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on Zeta-cypermethrin.
